title: Ben Affleck is a doting dad as he takes a sunny stroll
text:
He has five projects at different stages of production in the mix.

But Ben Affleck took time away from his busy schedule to spend quality time with his kids Violet, 13, and Samuel, seven on Friday.

The 47-year-old Justice League star wore a blue and white bomber jacket with a Harley-Davidson graphic tee underneath.

Cute: Ben Affleck took time away from his busy schedule to spend quality time with his kids Violet, 13, and Samuel, seven on Friday

He paired the look with dark-wash jeans and navy blue sneakers to match.

His teenage daughter mixed prints with a pair of high-waisted trousers dipped in turquoise stripes with a white rainbow-striped t-shirt tucked in.

Violet's feet navigated the pavement alongside her papa in polka-dotted Vans old-school sneakers.

Sweet: The 47-year-old Justice League star wore a blue and white bomber jacket with a Harley-Davidson graphic tee underneath

Little Samuel rushed ahead of his dad and sister in a forest-green polo shirt and a backpack over his shoulders.

Ben shares Violet and Samuel with fellow actress Jennifer Garner, whom he married in June of 2005 and officially divorced in October of last year.

The two remain amicable and often pick up their children from school together and attend church as a family.

Meanwhile, Jennifer was spotted in a beige coat, blue shirt and jeans with a coffee cup in hand walking with friends in another area of LA.

Doting: He paired the look with dark-wash jeans and navy blue sneakers to match

Jennifer has three projects in production including a TV series called My Glory Was I Had Such Friends.

The Miracles From Heaven star will also appear in Yes Day and Fantasy Camp.

Meanwhile, Ben also has a slew of projects in the works.

He's set to produce, direct and star in a new version of Witness for the Prosecution and World War II drama Ghost Army.

The actor is also lined up to star in several movies including a Jay and Silent Bob Reboot and an as yet untitled sequel to 2016's The Accountant.
